MemeDef.label: Ancestor Worship
MemeDef.description: Our ancestors watch over us from The Great Garden. May they bless and guide us forever.

MemeDef.label: Floral Reverence
MemeDef.description: The flowers and trees of the land nourish our bodies and souls; when they blossom, so do we.

MemeDef.label: Wanderlust
MemeDef.description: There is much that these lands can teach us; to stay in one place is to deny the ourselves new experiences.
